0.1.0.description:
## Setup Guide:

Download the following:

- ff12_open_world.apworld
- FF12Randomizer#.#.#.#.7z

### AP World and Seed Setup
1. In your Archipelago installation, add the ff12_open_world.apworld to the `\lib\worlds` folder
2. Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
3. Click `Generate Template Options` to open the folder with the template yaml files
4. Copy the `Final Fantasy 12 Open World.yaml` template to the `Players` folder
5. Open your YAML file and edit the `name: Player{number}` to set your name.
`{number}` is needed if there will others in the seed with a similar name, you can remove it otherwise.
Modify any other options you want below.
6. If hosting: Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
7. Click `Generate`
8. Go the `output` folder, and you will find your created `AP_#####.zip` file.
9. Open the `AP_#####.zip` file and copy out the player .json file with your name on it to somewhere you can find it (Ex: Copy it to your Desktop)
Ex: Player1 will need to grab `AP_#####_P1_Player1.json`
10. If you are hosting the game, take the  `AP_#####.zip` and upload it to: https://archipelago.gg/uploads

### Randomizer Seed Setup

1. Extract `FF12Randomizer#.#.#.#.7z` (using Windows, 7zip, etc)
2. Open the extracted folder and run FF12Rando.exe
It may take a while at first launch.
3. On the `1. Setup` page, download and install the required mods and any optional mods (Requires a NexusMods account)
4. At the bottom of the `1. Setup` page, click `Load from JSON` and select your player .json file from step 9 above
After you do this, the randomizer should switch to 'Archipelago Mode'
5. On the `2. Flags` page, select any additional settings
6. On the `4. Finish` page, click `Generate Seed`

### AP FF12 Open World Client

1. Launch the game
2. Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
3. Click `FF12 Open World Client`
4. Connect to your room with the correct port and player name

**WARNING:** Loading any other saves while connected to the client may send some unexpected checks to the server. Be careful not load any other saves (The load menu in this game is funky sometimes). I'm still working out the best way to avoid this.
0.1.0.title: FF12 Open World Archipelago 0.1.0

0.2.0.description:
## Changes
**NOTE: Requires you to update the apworld _and_ standalone randomizer**
Additions:
- New options for where progression/useful items can appear (All **DISABLED** by default)
  - include_treasures
  - include_chops
  - include_black_orbs
  - include_trophy_rare_games
  - include_hunt_rewards
  - include_clan_hall_rewards
- Added options for unlocking the Bahamut (Writ of Transit)
  - Defeat Cid 2
  - Collect All Pinewood Chops
  - Collect All Espers
  - Random Location
- Fixed unfilled locations sometimes
- Fixed shops being mostly the same
- Moved 'useless' trophies to filler
- Fixed client connection issues on linux hopefully
- Fixed crashing when receiving a large amount of items
- Fixed Hashmal and Cid 2 checks not triggering
- Fixed Footrace check triggering too early

## Setup Guide:

Download the following:

- ff12_open_world.apworld
- FF12Randomizer#.#.#.#.7z

### AP World and Seed Setup
1. In your Archipelago installation, add the ff12_open_world.apworld to the `\lib\worlds` folder
2. Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
3. Click `Generate Template Options` to open the folder with the template yaml files
4. Copy the `Final Fantasy 12 Open World.yaml` template to the `Players` folder
5. Open your YAML file and edit the `name: Player{number}` to set your name.
`{number}` is needed if there will others in the seed with a similar name, you can remove it otherwise.
6. Modify any other options you want further below in the YAML.
By default, locations are very limited for where progression/useful items can appear. Turn on any `include` options you want.
8. If hosting: Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
9. Click `Generate`
10. Go the `output` folder, and you will find your created `AP_#####.zip` file.
11. Open the `AP_#####.zip` file and copy out the player .json file with your name on it to somewhere you can find it (Ex: Copy it to your Desktop)
Ex: Player1 will need to grab `AP_#####_P1_Player1.json`
12. If you are hosting the game, take the  `AP_#####.zip` and upload it to: https://archipelago.gg/uploads

### Randomizer Seed Setup

1. Extract `FF12Randomizer#.#.#.#.7z` (using Windows, 7zip, etc)
2. Open the extracted folder and run FF12Rando.exe
It may take a while at first launch.
3. On the `1. Setup` page, download and install the required mods and any optional mods (Requires a NexusMods account)
4. At the bottom of the `1. Setup` page, click `Load from JSON` and select your player .json file from step 11 above
After you do this, the randomizer should switch to 'Archipelago Mode'
5. On the `2. Flags` page, select any additional settings
6. On the `4. Finish` page, click `Generate Seed`

### AP FF12 Open World Client

1. Launch the game in **ENGLISH** (Only language supported)
2. Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
3. Click `FF12 Open World Client`
4. Connect to your room with the correct port and player name

**WARNING:** Loading any other saves while connected to the client may send some unexpected checks to the server. Be careful not load any other saves (The load menu in this game is funky sometimes). I'm still working out the best way to avoid this.

## Changes
**NOTE: Requires you to update the apworld and standalone randomizer!**
- Reworked logic (**Check the key item descriptions!**)
  - Systems Access Key has been split into 3 progressive items
    - 1 - Rabanastre Area, Sandseas, Bhujerba, Bahamut
    - 2 - Ozmone Plain, Paramina Rift, Pharos
    - 3 - Archades Area (includes Balfonheim)
  - Dreadnought Leviathan
    - Alternative access with Basch (not guest) in the party. Goddess's Magicite still works

After you do this, the randomizer should switch to 'Archipelago Mode'
5. On the `2. Flags` page, select any additional settings
6. On the `4. Finish` page, click `Generate Seed`

### AP FF12 Open World Client

1. Launch the game in **ENGLISH** (Only language supported)
2. Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
3. Click `FF12 Open World Client`
4. Connect to your room with the correct port and player name

**WARNING:** Loading any other saves while connected to the client may send some unexpected checks to the server. Be careful not load any other saves (The load menu in this game is funky sometimes). I'm still working out the best way to avoid this.

0.3.7.description:
## Changes
**NOTE: Requires you to update the apworld and standalone randomizer! It is recommended to update and reinstall the External File and Lua loaders!**
- Fix logic issues with Disma and Dheed
- Update Sickle trophy reward to include Rageclaw in the name
- Updated the required file loader to the latest version


## Setup Guide:

Download the following:

- ff12_open_world.apworld
- FF12Randomizer#.#.#.#.7z

### AP World and Seed Setup
1. In your Archipelago installation, add the ff12_open_world.apworld to the `\lib\worlds` folder
2. Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
3. Click `Generate Template Options` to open the folder with the template yaml files
4. Copy the `Final Fantasy 12 Open World.yaml` template to the `Players` folder
5. Open your YAML file and edit the `name: Player{number}` to set your name.
`{number}` is needed if there will others in the seed with a similar name, you can remove it otherwise.
6. Modify any other options you want further below in the YAML.
By default, locations are very limited for where progression/useful items can appear. Turn on any `include` options you want.
8. If hosting: Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
9. Click `Generate`
10. Go the `output` folder, and you will find your created `AP_#####.zip` file.
11. Open the `AP_#####.zip` file and copy out the player .json file with your name on it to somewhere you can find it (Ex: Copy it to your Desktop)
Ex: Player1 will need to grab `AP_#####_P1_Player1.json`
12. If you are hosting the game, take the  `AP_#####.zip` and upload it to: https://archipelago.gg/uploads

### Randomizer Seed Setup

1. Extract `FF12Randomizer#.#.#.#.7z` (using Windows, 7zip, etc)
2. Open the extracted folder and run FF12Rando.exe
It may take a while at first launch.
3. On the `1. Setup` page, download and install the required mods and any optional mods (Requires a NexusMods account)
4. At the bottom of the `1. Setup` page, click `Load from JSON` and select your player .json file from step 11 above
After you do this, the randomizer should switch to 'Archipelago Mode'
5. On the `2. Flags` page, select any additional settings
6. On the `4. Finish` page, click `Generate Seed`

0.4.0.description:
## Changes
**NOTE: Requires you to update the apworld and standalone randomizer! It is recommended to update and reinstall the External File and Lua loaders!**
- Changed logic for the patient side quest, earth tyrant side quest to require defeating Vossler
Note: This makes reaching the northern areas harder to reach
- Added area names to the start of every reward location
- Removed excluded locations (not including custom exclusions in the YAML) from the AP pool. These excluded filler items are now placed locally in-game.
- New "condensed" license boards based on the vanilla and the split left/right variants
This is intended to help speed up license board menuing even more.
This also allowed for the new rando board to include some new augments like LP Boost, EXP Boost, Safety and more.
I'll eventually add back the full sized vanilla boards as an option...
(And it paves the way for even more crazy license rando options in the future)
- Ability and Equipment Descriptions now list all licenses and license boards which have that ability or equipment

I do expect this to break the poptracker due to all the name and logic changes

11. Open the `AP_#####.zip` file and copy out the player .json file with your name on it to somewhere you can find it (Ex: Copy it to your Desktop)
Ex: Player1 will need to grab `AP_#####_P1_Player1.json`
12. If you are hosting the game, take the  `AP_#####.zip` and upload it to: https://archipelago.gg/uploads

### Randomizer Seed Setup

1. Extract `FF12Randomizer#.#.#.#.7z` (using Windows, 7zip, etc)
2. Open the extracted folder and run FF12Rando.exe
It may take a while at first launch.
3. On the `1. Setup` page, download and install the required mods and any optional mods (Requires a NexusMods account)
4. At the bottom of the `1. Setup` page, click `Load from JSON` and select your player .json file from step 11 above
After you do this, the randomizer should switch to 'Archipelago Mode'
5. On the `2. Flags` page, select any additional settings
6. On the `4. Finish` page, click `Generate Seed`

### AP FF12 Open World Client

1. Launch the game in **ENGLISH** (Only language supported)
2. Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
3. Click `FF12 Open World Client`
4. Connect to your room with the correct port and player name

**WARNING:** Loading any other saves while connected to the client may send some unexpected checks to the server. Be careful not load any other saves (The load menu in this game is funky sometimes). I'm still working out the best way to avoid this.

0.6.0.description:
# 0.6.0 Changes
**NOTE: This patch requires you to update the apworld and standalone randomizer!**

**NOTE 2: The seed install process has changed! Rather than using a JSON file, download from the room using the Download patch link option and select the option to load a APFF12OW file in the FF12 randomizer program.**

- Added archipelago.json file to AP world needed for AP 0.7.0
- Character Scaling logic has been renamed and updated to also require access to areas with at most 3 difficulty lower
  - Prevents immediately needing to jump to hard content after unlocking a bunch of characters/second board
- Logic has been reworked and simplified as there are now proper regions. 
  - Allows you to exclude entire regions now in the YAML.
  - Logic exists to unlock areas through being sent to other areas (Most notably being sent to Balfonheim after defeating Cid 1 or 2)
  - Logic no longer requires going through areas like Zertinan to get to lower level areas like the Yensa Sandseas with the scaling logic option on
- Added new Writ of Transit goals to Defeat Shadowseer, Defeat Yiazmat, or Defeat Omega
- Added patch download link to the AP room
- Improved performance of the AP client and in game lua item receiving scripts
- Fixed seed history names being cut off for player names over 9 characters long
- Fixed Cloud Staff missing in licenses
- Fixed unique shops not properly scaling with the shop scale option
- Fixed systems access keys appearing in bazaar
- Fixed minor Dheed logic issues

# Setup Guide:

### Requires the steam version of Final Fantasy XII: The Zodiac Age

Download the following:

- ff12_open_world.apworld
- FF12Randomizer#.#.#.#.7z

### AP World and Seed Setup
1. Double click the ff12_open_world.apworld to install the AP world
2. Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
3. Click `Generate Template Options` to open the folder with the template yaml files
4. Copy the `Final Fantasy 12 Open World.yaml` template to the `Players` folder
5. Open your YAML file and edit the `name: Player{number}` to set your name.
`{number}` is needed if there will others in the seed with a similar name, you can remove it otherwise.
6. Modify any other options you want further below in the YAML.
By default, locations are very limited for where progression/useful items can appear. Turn on any `include` options you want.
8. If hosting: Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe) and Click `Generate`

### Randomizer Seed Setup After Room is Opened

1. In the AP room, click `Download Patch File...` to download your .apff12ow file
2. Extract `FF12Randomizer#.#.#.#.7z` (using Windows, 7zip, etc)
3. Open the extracted folder and run FF12Rando.exe
It may take a while at first launch.
4. On the `1. Setup` page, download and install the required mods and any optional mods (Requires a NexusMods account)
5. At the bottom of the `1. Setup` page, click `Load from ZIP/APFF12OW` and select your player .apff12ow file from step 1
After you do this, the randomizer should switch to 'Archipelago Mode'
6. On the `2. Flags` page, select any additional settings
7. On the `4. Finish` page, click `Generate Seed`

### AP FF12 Open World Client

1. Launch the game in **ENGLISH** (Only language supported)
2. Run the Archipelago Launcher (ArchipelagoLauncher.exe)
3. Click `FF12 Open World Client`
4. Connect to your room with the correct port and player name

**WARNING:** Loading any other saves while connected to the client may send some unexpected checks to the server. Be careful not load any other saves (The load menu in this game is funky sometimes). I'm still working out the best way to avoid this.
0.6.0.title: 0.6.0 Release
